name: Quantum Zoo
description:
Control an enraged Bengal Tiger as it escapes a futuristic zoo located in OUTERSPACE!

Arrow keys run, jump and kill in this simple game about vicious animal revenge! Once killed, you can devour the bodies of your enemies to regain health and add to your high score. Using low-gravity power ups, deadly pounce attacks and good old killer instinct, help the tiger escape the zoo and leave a trail of enemies in your wake!
